title: to report sb. to the police.
body:
Dear Community and Riot. I would like to know how i can track people that offend me inside your Game since the game itself doesnt disable the set of rules that are present within my country and the EU. So, to make use of my rights how can i track ppl that throw racist slurs and childish behaviour. 
Its time to bring the real world back to those who are getting really upset about your game. 
Easy.

replies.body: Lol...Riot is never going to share another player's information with you under any circumstances.

yeah i'm sure riot's gonna allow you to dox people
what is wrong with people bruh lol

just report it and move on

Actually according to the official law riot would be required to report it to the authorities once it becomes suspicious. 


They don't have an obligation to actually give you individually anything.

And even then for EUW the terms only apply to Irish laws. The euw server is based in ireland.
EUW server is actually in Amsterdam, The Netherlands
i can see where i went wrong, by "based in ireland" i mean they follow irish rulings.
YOU don't.  Your local authorities do.

This is proof that people are feeling entitled to being treated nicely.

Grow up people, you don't get to ruin lives because you got offended.

I live in the EU, and i do not see many people being arrested for childish behaviour :D

(I have only heard about some strange things from the UK, but they are leaving(?) soon(?) anyway(?). )

uk for me

It's pretty easy. You just break into the RIto servers, look up the IP (and timestamp) of his logins. Then you hack into his ISP's database, and look up the address. Or if he has a credit card connected to his account, you just have to hack into the bank's database. Easy peasy!

Jokes aside, they wont give YOU personally the information. If you call the police and explain your situation (be careful to wait until they finish laughing because if you talk while they are rolling on the floor, they would lose valuable information). Then the police can request information from Rito (and probably they would have to give the info to the police, i'm not sure). Otherwise you as just a random person have no right to request this information from Rito.

Ps.: What did you get this upset? Did you fall for a "Joe joke"? xD
